conversion_verification.notes: The 3D model presents a consistent isometric cutaway with clear verticality and wall thickness.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent transformation. Walls, floors, and volumes are clearly defined with high geometric integrity.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to the 2D plan. Room adjacencies and wall positions are almost perfectly matched, including the diagonal entrance to the master bath and kitchen island geometry.

interior_elements.notes: Fixtures and furniture are placed accurately according to labels; kitchen island and bathroom fixtures are particularly well-aligned.

visual_clarity.notes: Rendering is clean and lighting is good, but text labels (KITCHEN, BATH, etc.) within the 3D space result in a deduction.

detected_errors.description: Text labels from the 2D plan are superimposed onto the 3D render floor.

summary: A highly accurate and geometrically faithful 3D conversion that preserves the complex layout and architectural details of the original floor plan.
